snippet.title: Galakrond's Awakening Cinematic Trailer | Hearthstone
snippet.description:
Arch-Villain Rafaam unveils the League of E.V.I.L.'s villainous ploy to the now captive Reno Jackson, in the simplest of terms.

The fate of the world hangs in the balance, and now it’s up to you to decide the outcome! Choose your side for the final clash between the League of Explorers and the League of E.V.I.L. in the Galakrond's Awakening adventure, available January 21.

Pre-purchase: https://shop.battle.net/product/hearthstone-galakronds-awakening-adventure

Subscribe!
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=PlayHearthstone
